rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with a built-in storage unit and decorative elements. Placed near the main door following Vastu principles to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern open space with high ceilings and ample natural light; oriented east-west for balanced sunlight as per Vastu. Ideal for social gatherings and relaxation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Connected to the living room, featuring a large dining table designed with Indian aesthetics while ensuring comfortable space for family meals. Consider natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen layout following Vastu, with functional cabinetry and appliances placed in a U-shaped or L-shaped configuration. Preferably placed near the north-east corner to harness positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed with modern finishes and ample storage, oriented towards the south or west to promote a calm atmosphere. A private balcony overlooks the garden for relaxation.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom attached to the master bedroom, with a walk-in shower and sufficient space following Vastu guidelines. Located adjacent to the bedroom for privacy.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: A dedicated space for work or study, with good lighting and minimal distractions. Can be placed near the master bedroom or living area, ensuring a quiet environment.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to face the east as per Vastu principles for positive energy and auspicious beginnings. It leads directly to the Entrance Hall.

Large windows are strategically placed in the living room, master bedroom, and kitchen areas for maximum natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu recommendations for the east-west orientation.
A balcony adjacent to the master bedroom offers a view of the garden and ensures proper ventilation. It is designed with modern railings and integrated seating.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with sufficient storage, oriented to receive natural light. Placed on the upper level for privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Guest bathroom ensuring adequate space and ventilation, following Vastu principles with essential fixtures arranged to maintain a balanced flow.

openings.description: Balcony overlooking the large garden, providing fresh air and natural light to the guest bedroom. Designed with modern railings.
Large windows in the guest bedroom and bathroom to ensure proper ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.

garden.description: A spacious, landscaped garden with a mix of local flora, seating areas, and pathways. Designed to complement the building's modern architecture while enhancing environmental quality.

features.description: A small water feature placed centrally to enhance tranquility.
Curved pathways for leisurely strolls, connecting different parts of the garden.
